title: Interpretation of the vision of buying one lock and buying two locks in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of buying one lock and buying two locks in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. As for the interpretation of the vision of buying one lock and buying two locks in a dream.Interpretation of the dream of seeing the purchase of one lock and buying two locks in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin, one of the leading scholars of dream interpretation, said about Lock dreams. Whoever sees in a dream that he is buying a lock and then opening a hatch, then this dream indicates that he follows a broad diet for the dreamer, and if he is an unmarried young man, he will get married soon (and God is Most High and Most Knowing). Whoever sees in his dream that he has made a purchase, says that The dreamer suffers from many debts, so this dream indicates paying his debts to God Almighty, and God will provide him with abundant sustenance. (And God is the Most High, the Knowing). And whoever sees in his dream that he is buying a lock and it is open, and the dreamer has problems and quarrels with those he knows, then this dream indicates that the Blessed and Most High God will help him against his enemies and protect him. And his anguish and grief will be alleviated for him (and God is Most High and Most Knowing). And whoever sees in his dream that he is present and says in his house and the horn is open, then this dream indicates that God is present and God is protecting this house from the evil of men and jinn (and God is Most High and Most Knowing). Interpretation of the dream of seeing a lock in a dream. Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi. The great scholar (Al-Nabulsi), who is one of the leading scholars of dream interpretation, said that locking and buying a lock and a lock without a lock in a dream have many meanings, such as: Buying a lock indicates the marriage of a young man and an unmarried girl. An open lock indicates The prisoner will be released from prison and that God will relieve him of his distress and sadness. The lock indicates that the dreamer will give him abundant money and power and change his interest in joy and happiness. Interpretation of a dream about seeing buying two locks in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream that he is buying two locks, one closed and the other open, then this dream indicates that the dreamer is suffering from Some consequences and problems, but God Almighty will solve them. He. She. Command him and save him from all evil. The two locks in the dream show our relationship. The dreamer among them is in a state of confusion, but God, Blessed and Most High, will explain to him what is good for him and what is good for him (and God knows best). Interpretation of a dream about buying a lock in a dream for a married woman. Whoever sees in her dream that she bought a lock and brought it home, then this dream portends the goodness and strength of its owner. This indicates that God Almighty will bless her with a new baby in her life who will be in good health, morals and religion. It indicates that God Almighty will provide her husband with abundant sustenance by the grace of God (and God is Most High). Interpretation of a dream about buying a lock in a dream for a single girl. Whoever sees in her dream that she bought A lock and the lock is open, then this dream indicates good news for the dreamer. Evidence of her marriage to a religious and respectable young man who will protect her and protect her from all harm (and God knows best). An open mind indicates her success in the field of study and that she will be among the elite, God willing (and God is Most High and Most Knowing). Interpretation of a dream about buying a lock in a dream for a pregnant woman: Whoever sees during her pregnancy that she bought a lock, then this dream indicates the ease of the birth process for her and indicates that she will give birth to a child (boy) who will be in good health (God is Great and all

title: Interpretation of a dream about wine without drinking it

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about alcohol without drinking it in different situations. Alcohol is considered one of the things that God has forbidden the consumption of, due to its distraction and lack of awareness. Many accidents and misfortunes have occurred as a result of drinking alcohol, such as once a person wakes up from his negligence, he regrets it and swears that he did not know What he does, and it is certain that seeing wine in a dream is one of the frightening dreams of a fortune teller, especially in the event that the dreamer does not drink this wine and has not seen it even once in his life, so we present it to you today through our article in the Encyclopedia of Interpretation of a Dream about Wine without drinking it in any detail. Interpretation The dream of seeing wine without drinking it by Ibn Sirin: The great scholar and famous translator Ibn Sirin believes that seeing wine in a dream has many interpretations and associations. Seeing wine in a dream indicates the arrival of sorrows and worries to the pioneer, and wine in a dream can mean obtaining forbidden money, which will come to the dreamer without effort. Ibn Sirin says that whoever finds in his dream that he is drinking wine until he gets drunk and loses his mind, this is a sign that The dreamer will soon have a lot of money in his hands, but he does not thank God for not drinking alcohol, because this dreamer feels fear and anxiety, but this feeling will disappear very soon. And if the fortuneteller drinks alcohol in his dream, this is evidence that he consumed forbidden money. Unjustly. Drinking alcohol can be considered a sign of increasing disagreements with many people and can be a sign that the fortuneteller will break his covenant with some people, or he may go crazy and lose his memory. It could be a sign of the misfortune of death or the loss of a loved one...from a loved one, God forbid. Interpretation of a dream about seeing wine without drinking it according to Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation largely agrees with the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, as Al-Nabulsi says that drinking wine in a dream is considered a completely disturbing matter. , as it is considered a harbinger of the coming of sorrows and problems for the pioneer. Because seeing alcohol indicates forbidden money, God forbid. Interpretation of a dream about seeing alcohol without drinking it by Ibn Shaheen: Ibn Shaheen agrees with both Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi that seeing alcohol in a dream is a vision that does not bode well at all, as it is considered a sign of forbidden money that may be lost. The dreamer reaps it, and it may be a sign of the dreamer’s desire to do so. Falling into many sins and disobedience. Interpretation of a dream about seeing alcohol without drinking it for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, and a man: Interpretation of a dream about seeing alcohol without drinking it for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees alcohol in a dream and does not drink it, this may be a sign that she has a bad reputation, or that she She learns of the deterioration of her morals, which is not good at all, and that she is seeing alcohol. Without drinking it. In one dream, it may indicate that this girl will fall into evil. Attitude and disobedience. Interpretation of a dream about seeing alcohol without drinking it for a married woman: Seeing alcohol in a dream for a married woman indicates that she is of bad reputation and may be a sign of her incompatibility with the rights of her parents and their lack of justice, and it may also be A sign that she will be exposed to secrets from her life, either by herself or from a loved one

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a key in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a key in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The key is a very important tool that can be used to maintain the security and privacy of a door in any place, whether it is closed or at the door of the house or room. The appearance of the key in the dream expresses the dreamer’s livelihood, and seeing the key in the dream indicates the abundance of food and fulfillment. Money, more opportunities, achieving success and achieving goals and desires because it shows knowledge and interest. Learn about the dream of seeing a key in a dream. Dreaming of seeing a key by Ibn Sirin. To dream of seeing a key in your dream is a sign that you are earning a living, helping, or opening the door to knowledge. He also wants to see the keys of children, spies, or messengers. Seeing the key of a place in a dream, shows Country. Likewise, seeing a key in a dream means defeating the enemy. Seeing a dreamer holding a key in his hand indicates whether the water is pure or clean water. Whoever sees the key falling from his hand shows neglect of prayer throughout his life. It is good to see that the dreamer has many Of keys and making a lot of money.To see the dreamer adding the key to heaven means that he will obtain a pilgrimage or treasure.To see everything opened from the key is the gospel of hearing good news.Warning to see that the key is used to lock things is a warning to hear bad news.When the dreamer sees, It will be opened with a key that can be opened easily, this indicates that someone can help themselves. Seeing a woman giving him the key is a sign of her marriage. Dreaming of seeing an iron key Seeing an iron key is a sign of the victory of Almighty God. Seeing a wooden key means a curse or a bribe. The dreamer’s outlook on The mark on the key is a sign of how to become rich. Seeing that the key in a dream is broken means that something bad has happened to the dreamer. Losing a key means losing a job, business or money. Dreaming of seeing a married woman’s keyIf a married woman sees a key in a dream, it means money And prestige, and if she sees herself holding the key tightly, it means peace of mind and peace of mind in life. If she sees in her dream that she gave the key to someone and took the key from him, then this vision was a sign of kindness and a way to live. If a married woman finds the key in her dream, it means That she has a new property or a car that she has been wanting to buy for some time. However, if the dreamer is divorced and sees the key in her dream, this indicates that she will get rid of the pain and soon lose her sadness. If a married woman finds a key in her dream, this means that she has a new property Or a car that she has wanted to buy for a long time. But if the dreamer has been divorced and sees a key in the dream, this is evidence that he will soon be freed from sadness and grief. It shows that the dreamer has a will. It also indicates that the dreamer acquires three things, i.e. travel, or obtaining a home New, or work, or any of the worldly pleasures. If a married woman dreams that she is giving the key of the dream to another person, this portends a lot of goodness and you will get what you want. Seeing a key in a married woman’s dream is indicative of

title: Signs and symbols that herald pregnancy and having children in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we will talk about the signs and symbols that herald pregnancy and childbirth, including laughter and smiling, rain falling from the sky, and seeing the husband’s mother chasing the woman and giving her money. It portends pregnancy, and seeing eggs in a dream also portends pregnancy. To learn more clues, follow us in the following article. Dreams indicate imminent pregnancy and include children, their tools and attributes such as milk, teeth, and toys. Dreams that indicate pregnancy with a woman are dreams that carry connotations of tenderness, femininity, and beauty, such as flowers and butterflies. Dreams indicate pregnancy with a male. They include sharp tools and weapons or noble and noble animals such as horses. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to twins. This dream indicates kindness, happiness, and comfort. Signs and symbols that indicate pregnancy and childbirth in a dream. A married woman often sees many dreams during her sleep that carry hints and signs that indicate that she She is pregnant or her pregnancy is very close, and because of the importance of this vision, we will mention in today’s topic the signs and signs. Dreams that promise a woman her pregnancy, God willing. Seeing a promising pregnancy in a dream. During today’s article, we tried to collect for you all the evidence that a married woman will be pregnant. We used in this topic some true stories of women who were told visions and dreams, which later turned into a sign from God Almighty. To convey them: Where a woman says that she always dreamed that she was walking a long distance and then the ground opened up beneath her and she threw herself into a deep hole while she was alone, and after only two days of having this dream she found out that she was pregnant. Psychologists say that a married woman who has recurring dreams and nightmares While she was sleeping, she was pregnant due to the hormonal disturbances caused by pregnancy, which cause a psychological imbalance that results in nightmares and disturbing dreams during her sleep. There is another woman who reported that at the beginning of her pregnancy and before she knew it, she would often see in her sleep a cat clinging to her clothes and not letting go. It was very clear from Dreaming that she is pregnant. Seeing yourself wearing jewelry in a dream. A married woman’s dream of wearing anything during pregnancy is evidence of her pregnancy, as that woman desires to become pregnant, and the dress. Confirmation of the vision of pregnancy. Among the dreams confirmed by pregnancy, its companion is the vision of our Prophet Zechariah, peace be upon him, in the event that he sees a long-awaited married woman who is over her pregnancy. There is also a vision of a woman whose pregnancy was delayed, where she says that she lost hope of becoming a mother until the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, came to her in a dream and gave her a picture. There is a woman who narrates and says that she often sees a small brown snake chasing her and sitting at her feet, and this woman wants to get rid of it to no avail, and we see that this woman is actually taking birth control pills. In the same month, she suffers from health conditions that prevent her pregnancy from being completed. May God grant her this month and complete it well. Signs of pregnancy in a dream: There are many signs of pregnancy, including: visions and dreams.

title: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive for individuals

preview.html: Seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive for single people. One of the most difficult feelings that a person can face in his life is the loss of a loved one while he is suffering from separation or harm. We offer him advice and seek refuge from him, so in this article we will present the largest number. Cases and interpretations related to this symbol in a dream, as well as the sayings of major scholars and interpreters in the world of dreams, such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen.Seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive for singlesSeeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive for singles in a dream is considered one of the dreams that carries many Among the connotations that can be identified through the following cases: Seeing a dead body in a dream for a person while he is alive indicates his failure in worship and adhering to the teachings of his religion, and he must hasten to repent and approach God. An unmarried girl seeing a dead person in a dream while he is actually alive It indicates the return of the absent person from travel and reunification. Seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive Individuals Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin has discussed the interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive for unmarried people due to his frequent appearance, and the following are some of the interpretations given for that: Seeing a dead person in A dream while he is alive for individuals, according to Ibn Sirin, indicates good luck and success that will accompany her in life. If an unmarried girl sees a dead person in a dream while he is alive, this symbolizes positive changes and events that will occur in her life that she considered impossible to achieve. Seeing a dead person in A dream while he is alive for single people is according to Ibn Shaheen. One of the most prominent interpreters who dealt with the interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive is for an unmarried woman, according to Ibn Shaheen. Therefore, we will present some interpretations related to him through the following: An unmarried girl who sees a dead person in a dream while he is alive according to Ibn Shaheen. It is a sign of the ease of achieving desires and goals and achieving great achievements. Seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive for an unmarried woman indicates the cleanliness of her bed and her good reputation among people, which makes her endearing to those around her. Seeing a dead person in a dream while talking to single people who are alive has different interpretations. Seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive, speaking in a dream, depends on the dreamer’s social status. Here is the interpretation of an unmarried girl who sees this symbol: An unmarried girl who dreams that a dead man is talking to her while he is in reality alive and angry, is a sign of some disputes and conflicts between her and those close to him. If a girl dreams that she is talking to a dead man while he is still Alive, this symbolizes her longevity, health and well-being that she will enjoy in her life. Seeing a dead person in a dream who is alive and embracing a living person in one person. An unmarried girl who sees a dead person alive and a dead person in a dream and hugging another living person, indicates abundance and abundance of sustenance Which he will receive in his life and the blessings of his life and his money. Seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive and

Seeing a dead person in a dream who is alive and embracing a living person in one person. An unmarried girl who sees a dead person alive and a dead person in a dream and hugging another living person, indicates abundance and abundance of sustenance Which he will receive in his life and the blessings of his life and his money. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a plane trip in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an airplane in a dream We will discuss his dream of an airplane, the history of the airplane and a small airplane, and we will explain his dream of flying in an airplane and a kite and how to interpret it in the next man’s dream. Seeing the plane flying in the sky, the plane ladder in the dream, seeing the interpretation of the plane dream, the plane is married, the interpretation of the plane dream, the interpretation of the dream about flying with the mother. This article is today, and it is based on the leading Arab translators and scholars who fly in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about riding a plane, as the plane indicates the fulfillment of dreams and desires, hearing happy news, high status, and prestigious position. What is the interpretation of a dream about flying a plane in Al-Nabulsi’s dream: Ibn Sirin explained that people who see themselves flying in a dream can prove that they have succeeded at work Or study or life. Explain that the dream of entering an airport in the dream is evidence of achieving the goal, whether male or female. Dreaming of a large plane in a dream is a sign of obtaining the highest collective evaluation, perhaps the dreamed position in society. See the interpretation of thisThe plane is small, its dreams appear Starting a small project and achieving great success. Seeing the plane in the dreamer’s dream is evidence of achieving his goal. He explains his dream of traveling with the family, and his dream indicates that he is involved in a project that will succeed in the near future. As for whoever sees his plane falling in a dream, this is a warning about the verge of failure, but It is possible to overcome it and succeed.Interpretation of a dream about an airplane looking for a dream. His dream expresses his position on the path to success and excellence. For those who see him landing on a plane, his dream of a financial crisis heralds the end. Seeing the interpretation of flying in a dream denotes responding to a request and fulfilling his life’s hopes. Explain the dream of flying with the president and piloting a large plane, showing his status in society. Interpretation of the dream of flying and fear of flying Evidence of hesitation when making a decision. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an airplane in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of a dream about flying a plane for a single woman: If she dreams of an airport, the dream of an unmarried girl is evidence of a major change in all areas of her life. The dream of flying with one person faded, her dream indicates that The courtship and engagement contract is about to end. The interpretation of dreams for an unmarried couple flying a plane and landing safely proves that their lives will be happier. I dreamed of a helicopter with a sign saying that she would marry someone who works in the military administration. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing travel in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation The dream of flying a plane in a dream for a married woman: The interpretation of a married woman’s frightening boarding is evidence of the resolution of the major crisis that has afflicted her life. If a married woman sees herself on the plane that landed in her dream, the dream indicates that she has a respectable husband. Proof of dream interpretation: Airplane for the woman Married woman to stabilize her marital life. The interpretation of a dream about flying from a married woman also explained that there is a problem in her life and it will end soon. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing flying in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about war according to Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: One of the most sought-after dreams by many is the interpretation of a dream about war. This is because of the ambiguity and important messages that this dream conveys to humans. Therefore, many interpreters have tried to interpret this dream, and among these interpreters are Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Nabulsi. It is easy for you to learn the interpretation of a dream about war, so follow us.Interpretation of a dream about war according to Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen and NabulsiInterpretation of a dream about war according to Ibn SirinIbn Sirin sees many interpretations of war, each of which depends on the course of the dream, but there are fixed rules that rarely change.Interpretation of a dream about war between Two Sultans: If the war is between two sultans, this indicates a rebellion or an epidemic. Interpretation of a dream of war between the Sultan and the subjects. If he sees that the war is between the Sultan and the subjects, this indicates cheapness of food. Interpretation of the dream of war between the same subjects. If the war is between the subjects, this indicates the high cost of food. Interpretation Dream of War: If the dreamer has weapons and is among men without weapons, he has attained leadership. You may also be interested in: Dancing with a sword in a dream Seeing people quarreling in a dream Interpretation of a dream of war and dueling It expresses a person’s hostility or indicates disagreement, disagreement, and perhaps fighting with another person. Interpretation of striking with a sword Striking with a sword is an insult to the honor of God. Interpretation of throwing arrows in the path of God: If the Mujahid is in the path of God and is struck by an arrow, then he will obtain what he needs from his closeness to God Almighty. If he is injured in this, it is evidence that God has answered his prayers. Interpretation of a dream about war and operations in war. Whoever dreams of a wound in his hand indicates that money is coming to him, and if he is right, then it is money from a female, and if it is in the thumb of the right hand, then it is a debt to him. If it is on the left, it is from a relationship with a woman, and if he is injured in his left leg, it shows the money that comes to him from agriculture, and if the wound is in his heel, money will come. He has his son by his side and his heel. In general, begging wounds express bad livelihood or money. If blood is seen dripping from it, it is bad money. As for a wound on the head and no blood oozes, it indicates that a money wound is coming, but if blood is dripping. Spilled, money shows that they will come to him immediately. And he looks at it, but if he sees that the head wound is on the sultan’s head and the skin of his head and the bone are visible, then this indicates his long life, and if he dreams that he broke the bone, it indicates the defeat of his army, and if it was in his left hand, then his condition increases, and yet the wound in the right hand increases. The king, as for the stomach, shows an increase in money in his treasury, and if his thigh is wounded, this indicates the growth of the tribe, and he speaks openly about his affairs, which separates and divides him, blood flows, which indicates that the wounded person utters a true word to the wound. He saw that he was killing himself, then good things happened to him and he regretted it. As for whoever sees himself killed, this indicates a long life, and whoever sees that he has slaughtered a man, this indicates the injustice of the one who was slaughtered in his religion or in the sin that he is forced to commit. Interpretation of a dream about war and the army’s arrival in the city. Whoever sees soldiers coming to a city, this indicates that it is raining. Seeing a group of soldiers. If he sees the soldiers gathered together, this indicates the death of a person.

title: Interpretation of names in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribersFans A complete interpretation of names in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Many people search for it, because the names are countless and there are many names that belong to girls and boys and each of them has its own interpretations that you see in a dream. We will learn about the interpretation of dreams for names in a dream as Ibn Sirin explained for men and women Whether they are married or not, because the interpretation of each of them is different from the other. What is the interpretation of a dream about names by Ibn Sirin? The answer to the question of interpretation of a dream about namesInterpretation of dreamsNames in a dreamIf it is good and does not offend the dreamer, this indicates the pride and honor that the dreamer will receive. If he sees The dreamer dreams that he has been given a name other than his own and has good meanings, then this indicates pride and honor. If anyone sees a dream in which his name is different from his real name and his classification in the Most Beautiful Names of God indicates that he receives great attention from God Almighty and that God is greatly pleased with him. Seeing names attributed to God in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s victory and dominance over his enemies. What is the interpretation of a dream about the names of an unmarried woman? The answer to the question of interpreting a dream about names for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream is called a name with a good meaning, as it means nourishment and a good life that she lives. During this period. A girl’s dream that her name is associated with one of the most beautiful names of God, this indicates the coverage and goodness that she will receive in the near future. A girl’s dream of a person named Mary indicates people’s love for her and their closeness to God Almighty. If a girl sees someone calling her “Aliya” Or “high”, this indicates the high status that you will achieve. What is the interpretation of a dream about the names of a married woman? If he sees a married woman in the dream, people call her Ibtihal, which indicates stability in married life and happiness with the husband. If a woman is called Sundus in a dream, this indicates food Lawful and abundant money. A married woman dreams that her name is one of the names of the daughters of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, which indicates the satisfaction of his parents. And if he sees that she is calling him, then call her one of the names of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. A married woman dreams of being called a son, as this indicates good offspring for her. What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream about names? If a pregnant woman dreams of names that contain something of pride and beauty, this indicates that the pregnancy will continue and that she will experience an easy and plentiful birth. If a pregnant woman sees that she is giving birth to a boy and names him Joseph, this is a good sign that she will give birth to a beautiful, good, and righteous child. If a pregnant woman gives birth in a dream to a girl named Ibtihal, this indicates how happy she is. The pregnant woman gave birth to a woman in a dream, and her name was one of the names of the mothers of the believers, good news that they will be among the righteous, God willing. What is the interpretation of a dream about a man’s names? If a person sees in a dream a person called By the name of one of the names of God or by one of the names of the prophets, this indicates concealment from God in all His affairs. If a man is called in a dream by one of the names of the prophets, this indicates patience, strength and responsibility. A dream of a man named AdelDream
